name: Lost and Found Center
description:
This is a Global Game Jam game created in about a day. You can upvote it here.

Gameplay
- People come in to get their lost items
- You drag the items to the people
- Your score increases

Other info
- Press Esc/Space to pause and open the menu
- Press S to mute/unmute (although it's now in the menu as well)

Credits
- Pulni (me) - programming, game design, amazing voice acting, shop concept art (in paint :D )
- Trixiii - support (and some artsy stuff!)

Extra credits
- Music: Kevin MacLeod - Wallpaper (https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4604-wallpaper)
- Objects art: Playlectric - Power-Ups & Pick-Ups (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/power-ups-pick-ups-png-ai-ver...)
(perhaps it wasn't designed with this game in mind :thinking: )
- Cool effects: Seaside Studios - All In 1 Sprite Shader (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/all-in-1-sprite-shader-156513)
